alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Canyon Ferry Area; Gallatin Valley; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Madison River Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 1:56PM MDT until November 02 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Light rain falling on valley floors will freeze on surfaces leading to ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Valleys of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From 6 AM to Noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions especially during the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions are likely to improve during the early afternoon as road surfaces warm.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
